price: And He has created for you various kinds of things on earth[8]. Indeed, there are signs in this for people who take heed.
arabic: وَمَا ذَرَأَ لَكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ مُخۡتَلِفًا أَلۡوَٰنُهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَأٓيَةٗ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَذَّكَّرُونَ
footnotes: [8] Such as animals, minerals, plants and inanimate objects.
